    • Method Detail

      • testCollision

        @Test
void testCollision()
        Tests if there is a collision between a projectile and enemy. Both the projectile and enemy start at the coordinates 10,10, so they are trivially colliding

      • testNoCollision

        @Test
void testNoCollision()
        Tests if there is a collision between a projectile and enemy that are not colliding.

      • testVerticalCollision

        @Test
void testVerticalCollision()
        Tests if there is a collision between a projectile and enemy that are partially overlapping vertically (e.g. the projectile hitting the enemy directly from the top)

      • testHorizonalCollision

        @Test
void testHorizonalCollision()
        Tests if there is a collision between a projectile and enemy that are partially overlapping horizontally (e.g. the projectile hitting the enemy directly from the size)

      • testEnemy

        @Test
void testEnemy()
        Tests setting and getting the fields in a default enemy

      • testTower

        @Test
void testTower()
        Tests setting and getting the fields in the default towers

      • testProjectile

        @Test
void testProjectile()
        Tests setting and getting the fields in the default Projectile

      • testIsGameNotOver

        @Test
void testIsGameNotOver()
        Tests if the game is not over through the controller. If the controller has just been created, the game should not be considered over.

      • testIsGameOver

        @Test
void testIsGameOver()
        Tests if the game is over. If the wave number is 5 or greater, the game should be complete.

      • testControllerPurchaseTower

        @Test
void testControllerPurchaseTower()
        Tests if we can purchase a tower. A player's starting money is 1000 and the default tower's cost is less than though, so we should be able to purchase it.

      • testControllerCantPurchaseTower

        @Test
void testControllerCantPurchaseTower()
        Tests if we can't purchase a tower because we don't have enough money
